content.protection: 7 draws plus 2 chains. Lower or rappel off.
content.location: Left most route on the wall

content.description: At the center of the wall  the third route from the left. A classic line on big holds out an increasingly steep wall. The crux hits you at the last moves. See if you can find the no hands rest.
content.protection: 7 or 8 bolts plus chains. Lower off or rappel.
content.location: Center of wall, third route from left.

climbs.name: DNR
climbs.fa: Susan Wolfe, John Werner, Tim Wolfe

content.location: Right most route on the wall.

content.description: The route immediately to the right of JVS. Originally rated 5.10c  this route is quite stout for that grade. Climb straight up big holds to the top and traverse a few feet to the chains on top of treadmill. Keep your head cool for the crimpy moves and slight runnout up to the last bolt. Due to the wet weather and the lack of traffic recently, this route needs more traffic and it will clean up again.
content.protection: 6 bolts plus 2 chains. Lower or Rappel off.
